name.title: Accessory Name in Home
name.description: How it will appear in the Home app (e.g. "RainSoft EC5" or "Water Softener").

modelLabel.title: Model Label
modelLabel.description: RainSoft Remind → System Info → Model. Used for HomeKit Accessory Information.

serialNumber.title: Serial Number
serialNumber.description: RainSoft Remind → System Info → Serial Number. Used for HomeKit Accessory Information.

deviceId.title: Device ID
deviceId.description: Numeric ID from the RainSoft API URL (/device/######).

authToken.title: Auth Token
authToken.description: Value of the X-Remind-Auth-Token header captured from the RainSoft Remind app. KEEP THIS SECRET!

pollSeconds.title: Polling Interval (seconds)
pollSeconds.description: How often to refresh salt level and status. Default 300 (5 min). Lower = more requests.

forceUpdate.title: Force Update Before Poll
forceUpdate.description: Call RainSoft's /forceupdate first to ask the unit for fresh data before reading values.
